pullrequest.title: [gz11] Add dom methods for setting axis and thread pitch

content.raw: I usually have the impulse of making these const params like in the rest of the API, but apparently it's [not good practice](https://clang.llvm.org/extra/clang-tidy/checks/readability-avoid-const-params-in-decls.html) to declare copied values as const. Just mentioning here for the future... I think it would be good to stick with one or the other. The `SetAxis` function for example is using `const unsigned int`.
content.html: I usually have the impulse of making these const params like in the rest of the API, but apparently it's not good practice to declare copied values as const. Just mentioning here for the future... I think it would be good to stick with one or the other. The SetAxis function for example is using const unsigned int.
